column2: Should We Ask USA For Help?
The perspective of our war against Mexico doesn't look too bright. They outnumber us and our independence is only a matter of time. Maybe we could ask our neighbour for help against the Mexicans?
Texas Calls For Help

A diplomat from Texas has reached us with worrying news. Their rights are being violently taken from them and they have turned to us looking for help. Should we lend our helping hand to our fellow Americans?
The New Protector of Eastern Christians

Now that we are powerful enough to hold our own, an important matter rose up regarding our role in the Eastern Christendom. It is a well known fact that the Byzantine Empire for a long time was the center of the Orthodox Church and the Eastern Christendom as a whole. Sadly, we've lost our authority and power due to numerous wars and raids and our title as the protector was taken by an another powerful Orthodox nation known as the Russian Empire. We are glad that they've been doing our work for centuries now, but it's time that we take this title back since it's supposed to be us that should protect that Eastern Christians.
The Orthodox Question

We've been notified that the newly restored Byzantine Empire seeks to recaim its title as the Orthodox Protector. We've taken their duty to continue protecting the Eastern Christendom as a powerful nation within it. Should we stand down and give the title back to its original owner, or should we hold onto it?
The Russian Empire refused!
The fools of The Russian Empire refuted our rightfull claim on the title of the Orthodox Protector. The title is ours by definition and they will pay for denying us our claim.
The Russian Empire accepted!
As we expected, the Russians complied and offered back the title of Eastern Protectors. This is a joyous day for the mighty Empire!
The War is Won!
We have proven in battle that we are truly worth the title we were fighting for. The Russian Empire will have to agree to our demands and our position in the Eastern Christendom will be restored.
The War is Lost!

We have lost the war and forever lost the right to call ourselves the Protectors of Eastern Christendom. The new title owners have proven themselves to be more suitable for this role and we'll have to set our sights elsewhere.
Byzantine Anatolia
We should restore the proper names of Anatolian provinces.
Restore Anatolia
We returned Anatolia under Turkish rule and should return the respective names for its provinces.
Byzantine Armenia
The return of Armenian lands should be accompanied with the restoration of their proper names.
Restore Armenia
We should restore the Armenian names to the reclaimed provinces.
Restore Armenia
We returned our Armenian lands and should restore their proper names.
Byzantine Levant
Levant is ours and its province names should be restored to respective old names.
Restore Levant
Levant is returned and the names of its provinces should be restored.
Byzanine Egypt
Aegyptus has been returned and should be assigned proper province names of old.
Byzantine Cyrenaica
While we advance West we could restore the original names of the provinces of Cyrenaica.
Byzantine Tripolitania
The Province of Tripolitania should be assigned its proper name as well as its cities.
Byzantine Tunisia
The lands of Carthage is ours and as a symbol of our victory we should assign proper Roman names to its cities.
Turkish Assimilation
